page.title: 17Interesting Weekend Trips
page.content: What interesting and enjoyable activities are there to do at holidays and weekends? If the weather is good you can go to the beach at Aberdour which is often called the "Silver Sands".In Dunfermline is the Pittencrieff Glen with a small museum,an aviary,a pets corner and large greenhouses.Anyone interested in nature could visit Lochore Country Meadows or Vane Farm Nature Reserve which are both quite near.In Kirkcaldy you could visit Beveridge Park or the swimming baths.If you travel to Edinburgh there are many interesting places to visit including the castle,the zoo,the museum and the waxworks.
